My weekend was great. Saturday night Yesenia, Yemile and Rigo came to my house. We were "watching" Gothica. lol. I had alot of fun. First they got to my house and we went out to eat. Then we all came back to my house and saw the omovie. The hole time Rigo was holding me and kissing me. It felt so good to be in his arms. Around 2 a.m. Yemile went to pick drop off Yesenia and left Rigo at my house. When it was just me and Rigo it started to get intense. WOW.

I am trying to make plans for dis weekend. We r trying to go to the regeton fest.
http://queenshysti17.livejournal.com/3232.html

First i wanna say there is gonna be like 4 different stories on here.
   Well it's bout time Andy and I are talkin again. You see whut happen was that he got mad at me back in January and we stopped talkin. Well since i am trying to hook up my homegurl with his homeboy which is my friend to, i told him we are gonna have to get along. He agreed. So i am so excited. I mean i miss talkin to him. He is really cool and shyt.
    I told Yemile the guy that i am trying to hook up with my homegurl that he is gonna have to choose between my gurl Yesenia or my other gurl Michelle. You see basically he is talking to both.
     I had so much fun this weekend. Friday night i chilled with this guy Rigo that i have like for about 5 years. Saturday night i chilled with Rigo, Yesenia and Yemile and we went to Las Olas. It was alot of fun. Well w/e im out.
Yead
http://queenshysti17.livejournal.com/2910.html

OMG i don't thing there is n e such things as friends. Ok i just got my lisence and i decided to pick up my frined Sarah. We wanted to do somthing. So she called her dumb ass ex boy friend that she says she is over but is not. Well we pick him up and go back to her house to watch a movie. I felt so uncomfortable. The whole time they were making out. I felt like the third wheel. So i decided to text this guy Lauren. He is a savior. He came and picked me up. He says he know how i felt. He has been in  that place before.
I don't undastand. Y is she gonna say she is ova and and is not. Well g2g
http://queenshysti17.livejournal.com/2602.html

Well dis weekend i got the courage to tell my best friend that i liked one of her good friends Lauren. He is such a sweet heart. I mean he is so funny and he is cute too. 
A couple weekends of go he went with me to a quince i invited him too. And now we are talking. I hope that one day we can be together. 
He knows that i like him. I told him from the begining.
Sarah still likes her ex boyfriend Paul. He is such a dork. I can't stand him. I mean don't get me wrong he is really nice when he is not with her. But when thet are together, he tells her who she can and can not talk to. What she can wear and shyt. Whuts up with dat. Well n e wayz gotta go.
http://queenshysti17.livejournal.com/2402.html

My weekend was great. I had so much fun. Friday night i went to a quince. I took my homeboy Lauren and myhomegurl Gabby with me.We had alot of fun.  Gabby slept over my house and we talked all night about things that happen to us and of course boys. Then Saturdayi went to the beach with my homegurl Jessica and we chilled all day. At night i went to the movies with Rigo.We sat U Got Served. That was the millionth time that i saw that movie. 
I also got in another fight with Yemil. He is such an idiot. Whut eva
i think that one of my best friends is pregnant. She is so crazy. She doesn't believe in abortions so she is hoping to have a miscarriage. Well i have to  go
One

Hi n e wayz i haven't wrote in dis shyt in a long time. well i have alot to say but right now i don't have time. I will write when i get a chance. Well n e wayz i have to go right now. Holla at ya lata.
Krystal

I had such a good morning. I woke up and got ready for school. Around 5:30 Rigo called me and said that he would take me to school. So around 7:00 he picked me up, we went and got breakfast and he took me to school. He wanted me to skip school with him, but i couldn't. I have a presentation today. SO whut we are gonna do. He is gonna pick me up after school. We are gonna go back to my house and we are gonna spend all weekend together. He is gonna sleep ova my house and i am gonna sleep ova his.
http://queenshysti17.livejournal.com/1692.html

Today i had a good day. I got home from school and did my homework. After i did my work i fell asleep. Around 7:00 p.m. my friend Sarah showed up at my house and woke me up. She was really sad. I walked around the neighborhood with her. We had alot of fun. I took her mind off of whuteva was bothering her. Then I taked to my homeboy Yemil. I am hooking him up with my homegurl Michelle. They like eachother. I am so excited for them. Theis Friday we are all suppose to chill. Andy (my booty call), Carlos, Yemil, Michelle and Gaby. We most likely will be at my house chillin. I can't wait. 
I haven't talked to Rigo. i mean i called him but he hasn't answered his phone because of work. Well n e wayz i am gonna go because Ramiel is gonna use the computer now.
Love yall
Shysti

if i cant do it homie i cant be done! your new layout is finished krystal thanks to me! ...merry birthday =) --Pimp Tom Pimp

Yesterday was my birthday. I had celebrated it during the weekend. i had so much fun. Saturday i had a bunch of friends come to my house to chill. All the people i had invited didn't show p because they had a field trip.
The people that showed up was Sarah, Jackie, Nick, Michelle, Andy, Ron,Junito, and Vanessa. We chilled and danced. We staretd playing with ice. We were puttig ice down peoples shirts and shyt. It was pretty cool. Michelle was staying at my house till 7. While everyone else was leaving my good homeboy Yemile showed up and chilled for a lil. Michelle and I wanted to go to the movies. So we talked her mom into letting her go to the movies. Then she told me to talk Yemil and tell him to go with us to the movies because she wanted to holla at him. So he said he would go. Then i called this guy Rigo that i liked since i was like 13. I told him to come with me so we could double date. So he said yes he would come. When we got in the movies Rigo wanted to get something to eat so i stood in line with him. I told Michelle and Yemil to go get a seat, so that way they could talk to eachother. While Rigo and I were in line this gurl came up to him and gave him a kiss on the cheek. He then turned towards me and said don't get jealous she was just a friend. 
Then when me and him went into the movies we sat next to eachother and started talking. When the movie started ("My Baby's Daddy") He started holding my hand and had his arm around me. Then we started making out. Then he grabbed my hand again and started rubbing his finger on my palm. Then he said if i knew whut that meaned and i said yes. 
Then when the movies was over he took me home. My mom loves him. She said he is so sweet. I do too. Well n e wayz i guess i will tell you whut else happend tomorrow because Mrs.Capezza is about to start class, so i have to go.
And i am sad because Tom didn't go to my pary and didn't get my Pooh Bear.
